item.title: The whole footpath is an absolute disgrace repeatedly filled in when it needs a complete resurface to make it safe for disabled residents with walking aids, 27th February
item.description:
Footpath between 8 -14 chandos drive is a health hazard an accident waiting to happen Repeated filling in holes gave made it 10 times worse leavibg an uneven surface not compatible with walking aids and wheelchairs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chandos Drive, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop appaers to be leaning over, 27th February
item.description:
Springbank Drive bus stop. Bus stop is not straight. Can we also have a bus shelter. We have been waiting long enough.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: Dropped kerbs all damaged beoken outside 1-5 Ingleborough Mews, 27th February
item.description:
Dropped kerbs outside of new build property’s Ingleborough Mews, damaged rocking snapped from buses on bus route, now become dangerous to drive over on to our drive as potentially cause damage to our cars

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Pennine Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Manhole cover on crossroad is really noisy, 27th February
item.description:
Crossroad manhole cover when cars come from Tesco direction to Cheltenham. The manhole cover makes a huge noise ‘cuclunk.’ It’s loud and it keeps us up at night every time a car goes over it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 397-399, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recurring pothole opposite drive of ‘Woodhay’, 27th February
item.description:
Just opposite the driveway entrance to the house named ‘Woodhay’ on Green Lane there is a pothole. This has been repaired quite a few times but keeps reappearing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New barn lane covered in gravel, 27th February
item.description:
New Barn Lane is covered in gravel from the recent very poor pothole repairs that broke up within a week. There is now loads of gravel in the gutter and the middle of the road and this now represents a risk to people's car paintwork and windscreens and cyclists on bikes. Please sweep both east and west directions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 141, New Barn Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gulley is block, 27th February
item.description:
Gulley is blocked. This happens every few years. The routine maintenance of this gulley is not sufficient. Modest rainfall today has overwhelmed the drains. Flooding is outside 25 Whaddon Road and extends down to the corner shop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Whaddon Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is a constant flow of water that is creating further damage to Stockwell Lane. The lane is scheduled for re surfacing between the 16th and 20th of March. It is vital this water is properly drained or it will result in the constant flow and more damage to Stockwell Lane., 27th February
item.description:
The water leak is outside of Shhepway and Emblem Cottage at the top of Stockwell Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: X 2 large potholes & broken drain in grass verge, 27th February
item.description:
Outside 198 Innsworth Lane. I first reported this problem back in Nov 25, again in Jan 26. It gets sprayed then nothing done.You sent me an email to say it's fixed when it is clearly not. We've now got a barrier around a broken drain in the grass as well, it all looks unsightly. Please could you fix all these problems ASAP as I am looking to sell & can't in this mess. I will need to take this higher if not resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed and diversion signs left, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Cleeve
